title: Feature Request: Automatic XML Import from URI
author: darkpixel
body_snippet:
I would love to see a feature in mRemote where it would automatically load/import an XML config file on startup.

This would be helpful for provisioning mRemote for lots of users.

An example environment would be a call center where users needs to connect out to various offices to pull up records.

Rather than reminding everyone to "delete their mRemote config and then re-import it from the usual location", I would love to tell mRemote to always automatically load connections from ```https...
